Package sep.tinee.net.message

A base interface and concrete classes for messages understood and communicated by instances of Server.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Message
    A base interface for messages that can be communicated using ClientChannel with an instance of Server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bye
    A BYE message: Tell a Server instance to terminate this communication session.
    Push
    A PUSH message: tells a Server instance to append a list of tines from a user to each (possibly new) tag in the set of tags.
    ReadReply
    A READ-REPLY message: the server reply to a READ request: the list of lines recorded by the server for the specified tag, listed from the specified index.
    ReadRequest
    A READ message: tells a Server instance to return the currently recorded (sub)list of tines for a given tag, as listed from the specified index (inclusive, starting from index 0).
    ShowReply
    A SHOW-REPLY message: the server reply to a SHOW request: the set of tags explicitly recorded by the server.
    ShowRequest
    A SHOW message: tells a Server instance to return the currently recorded set of ticket tags and creators (user names).

Package sep.tinee.net.message Description

A base interface and concrete classes for messages understood and communicated by instances of Server.

You can send and receive instances of these messages using the provided ClientChannel.
